intro: This Privacy Policy explains how NOBT World collects, uses, and safeguards your personal information when you use our website and services.

sections.title: 1. Information Collection
sections.content: We collect personal information such as name, contact details, and identification only for booking and communication purposes.

sections.title: 2. Use of Information
items: Your information is used for booking confirmation, travel arrangements, and customer communication.
We may use your contact information to send booking updates, important notices, or promotional content (you can opt out anytime).

sections.title: 3. Data Sharing
items: Your data is never sold or shared with third parties.
Information may be shared only where required for travel arrangements (hotels, transport providers, activity operators, etc.).

sections.title: 4. Payment Security
items: All payment information is processed through secure and encrypted payment gateways.
We do not store sensitive payment details on our servers.

sections.title: 5. User Consent
sections.content: By using our website, you consent to our privacy practices as described in this Privacy Policy.
